summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney organizing a moot court session for an Epstein-related FOIA case. It mentions an 'all-star cast' of participants and notes that some Bureau of Prisons (BOP) personnel may join.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, organizing a moot court session for an Epstein FOIA case and mentioning that BOP personnel may join.

events.title: Epstein FOIA Moot Court Session
events.description: A moot court session is being organized for an Epstein-related FOIA case, with an 'all-star cast' of participants and potential attendance from BOP personnel.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney sending the email.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney organized a moot court session for an Epstein FOIA case on March 26, 2021.
The email references an 'all-star cast' of participants for the moot court.
The email indicates that some Bureau of Prisons (BOP) personnel were expected to join the session.
The sender's office is located at 300 Quarropas Street, White Plains, NY 10601.
